articles.title: Jaylen Brown has 30 points, 13 rebounds as Celtics coast to 107-79 win over Bucks
articles.description:

articles.title: Red Sox’ Jovani Morán denied insurance amid WBC uncertainty
articles.description:
Amid lefthander Jovani Morán’s quest to win a spot in the Red Sox bullpen, a twist in the subplot: He has been denied insurance to participate in the World Baseball Classic, making him an unlikely member of Puerto Rico’s squad for the March tournament. According to a league source, the players’ union recently informed Morán […]

The post Red Sox’ Jovani Morán denied insurance amid WBC uncertainty appeared first on Boston.com.
